    (vii) ESUTECH accepts ND in relevant programmes 
within the Faculty into 200 level in addition to 
the UTME requirements.  
(viii) EVANGEL requires two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in  
Economics and any of Science, Social Science or 
Management subjects plus “O’ level 
requirements.  
(ix) IGBINEDION as in Accounting.   
(x) IMSU and PHC - No Direct Entry  
(xi) LAGOS accepts very good passes in three (3) 
JUPEB/A-LEVEL   subjects: Economics and any 
other two (2) subjects from Financial 
Accounting, Business Studies, Mathematics, 
Geography and Government.  
(xii) MCPHERSON accepts  
a) ND upper credit in relevant programmes.  
b) Foundation of professional examinations 
such as ICAN, ACCA, ICMA& CIBN  
c) JUPEB/IJMB ‘A’ level or equivalent in 
related programmes.  
(xiii) OOU accepts   
a) ‘A’ level passes in Economics and other 
subjects plus ‘O’ level credit passes in  
English Language and Mathematics;  
b) 'A'  level  passes  in 
 Economics  and Accounting.  
c) ND/HND and NCE not below the equivalent 
of upper credit in relevant subjects from 
recognized institutions as well as 
Foundation/ Intermediate Passes of the 
ICAN, ACCA, ICMA and CIPFA.  
(xiv) PHC, ESUTECH and UNIZIK require Direct Entry 
applicants to possess the UTME requirements.  
(xv) RSUST - Same as in Accountancy.  
(xvi) UNIZIK does not accept Geography. (xvii) UNN 
accepts
